projects.name: PredictChain
bullets: Developed a user-friendly marketplace for predictive AI models
Supported dataset uploads, model training requests, and transparent blockchain transactions
1st place & “Most Innovative Technology” at 2023 MEGA-ACE Hackathon at RPI

projects.name: MIMAX
bullets: Led a team of five using Scrum and Agile methodologies
Integrated TMDb API for movie/TV data, search, ratings, and spotlights

projects.name: Discord Utility Bot
bullets: Custom Discord bot for server moderation and fun commands
Automated role assignment, message logging, and user engagement features
Deployed and maintained for a gaming community

projects.name: Tip Automation & Paycheck Predictor
bullets: Python scripts to automate tip entry and calculations for restaurant work
Calculates averages, predicts next paycheck, and tracks daily/weekly earnings
Outputs to a Google Sheet for real-time updates and analytics
Improved accuracy and saved hours of manual entry
